content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)
- All drills are working and fueled with coal

### Mixed Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Storage chests at (-27.5,-59.5) and (-24.5,-58.5)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0) and (-21.0,-58.0)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), and (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts connecting the system

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Storage chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), and (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output
- Connected transport belt system

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=18 to 27)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Connected pipe network for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to fuel management
- Ensure sufficient coal is in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into entities
- Keep mining drills fueled to prevent work stoppage

### Errors related to inserter placement and operation
- Ensure proper destination entities exist before placing inserters
- Check that inserters have valid pickup and drop-off positions

### Errors related to chest management
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Empty full chests to maintain production flow

### Errors related to fluid systems
- Ensure proper pipe connections between water source, boiler, and steam engine
- Maintain continuous water supply for power generation
